scenario_text.value:
There you are. Finally.
I nearly died waiting.

Hee hee, I’ve been waiting and waiting all
night for you. Awfully nice of me, wasn’t it?

Now can we get this over with already? I’m
tired and I want to catch up on my sleep.

Oh, we’ll put you to sleep for good. But
first you’re telling us how to get back home!
